extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Walla Walla Source app, your Walla Walla Wine companion.Browse all Walla Walla wineries, search by who's open today, and add your favorites to remember which places to hit on your next visit.Looking for the next stop? Use our maps to quickly get directions to the next location. If you're not sure where you would like to go next, load up a map of all wineries and find whats closest to you.Don't see one of your favorite locations? Shoot me an email and I'll add it right away - dkay@wallawallasource.com (no update needed). Feel free to pass on any suggestionsor anything else that would make your Walla Walla Wine experience easier and more enjoyable!
